intro.heading: Discover IXORA MBMB
intro.subheading: MBMB Digital Gateway to a Smart City
intro.p1: The IXORA MBMB ecosystem is a next-generation digital platform developed by Majlis Bandaraya Melaka Bersejarah (MBMB) to revolutionize how local government services are delivered to the public.
intro.p2: Community-centric by design, IXORA MBMB makes interactions with the authority easier, faster and more transparent. It unifies multiple municipal service processes into one integrated system, reducing the need for separate visits or disjointed portals.

oneStop.desc: Access all services in one portal

counterless.desc: No need to visit physical counters

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions – IXORA MBMB Digital Ecosystem

1.heading: 1. GENERAL & INTRODUCTION
1.a1: IXORA MBMB is MBMB's all-in-one digital ecosystem, not just a payment portal.
1.a2: The MBMB Digital Gateway for all resident and business transactions.
1.a3: Individuals, businesses, tourists and the local community.

2.heading: 2. BENEFITS TO CITIZENS & BUSINESSES
list: One-stop – all MBMB services in 1 application.
Inclusive – kiosks & mobile terminals for elderly / less digital users.

3.heading: 3. SERVICES & MODULES
3.body: Core modules include: Assessment Tax, Business Licensing, Building Permit, Stall Rental, Parking, Compounds, Animal Licensing, Instalment Plans. Internal operations use IXORA Workspace for processing & approvals.

4.heading: 4. COST & MAINTENANCE
4.body: Development covers payment integration, MyData SSM & AI Chatbot. Maintenance is funded via MBMB annual ICT budget. No extra MBMB fees (only bank/eWallet charges).

5.heading: 5. SECURITY & COMPLIANCE
5.body: IXORA MBMB uses MBMB Private Cloud, SSO, encryption, audit trail and complies with PDPA 2010 & MBMB ICT Security Policy.

6.heading: 6. OPERATIONS & CONTINUITY
6.body: IXORA MBMB has a Disaster Recovery Plan, daily backups, auto-scaling servers & modular architecture.

7.heading: 7. KPI & PERFORMANCE
7.body: KPIs: ≥95% digital collection, ≥80% online applications, ≤7 days new license processing, ≥85% user satisfaction. Performance monitored via real-time Analytics Dashboard.
